com.poesys.accounting.bs.account

Class CapitalAccountDelegate

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.poesys.bs.delegate.AbstractDaoDelegate<S>
      • com.poesys.bs.delegate.AbstractDataDelegate<BsCapitalAccount,ICapitalAccount,com.poesys.db.pk.CompositePrimaryKey>
        • com.poesys.accounting.bs.account.AbstractCapitalAccountDelegate
          • com.poesys.accounting.bs.account.CapitalAccountDelegate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.poesys.bs.delegate.IDataDelegate<BsCapitalAccount,ICapitalAccount,com.poesys.db.pk.CompositePrimaryKey>

    public class CapitalAccountDelegate
extends AbstractCapitalAccountDelegate

    A business delegate that provides an application programming interface for CapitalAccount objects and their dependents. This class delegates to an abstract class, AbstractCapitalAccountDelegate. You can modify this class to override methods in that class or to add operations to the API.

    Author:
    Poesys/DB Cartridge
